Class HW2_zfergus2.SutherlandHodgmanPolygonClipping

  • java.lang.Object
    • HW2_zfergus2.SutherlandHodgmanPolygonClipping
  • Enclosing class:
    HW2_zfergus2

    public static class HW2_zfergus2.SutherlandHodgmanPolygonClipping
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the Sutherland Hodgman Polygon-Clipping Algorithm, algorithm for clipping a polygon to be inside a clipping area.
    Author:
    Zachary Ferguson

    • Method Detail

      • clipPolygon

        public static double[][] clipPolygon(double[][] polygon,
                                     float xmin,
                                     float xmax,
                                     float ymin,
                                     float ymax)
        Clips the polygon given the vertices and the clipping area.
        Parameters:
        polygon - A double[][] for the vertices of the polygon.
        xmin - The minimum x position of the clipping area.
        xmax - The maximum x position of the clipping area.
        ymin - The minimum y position of the clipping area.
        ymax - The maximum y position of the clipping area.
        Returns:
        Returns a double[][] for the clipped polygon's vertices.

      • isInside

        public static boolean isInside(double[] v,
                               float edgeVal,
                               HW2_zfergus2.SutherlandHodgmanPolygonClipping.ClippingEdge clippingEdge)
        Determines if the given point is inside the specified edge.
        Parameters:
        v - A double[] for the position vector of the point.
        edgeVal - A float for the value of the edge to compare with.
        clippingEdge - The ClippingEdge for the edge to compare with.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean for if the point is inside the edge.

      • getIntersection

        public static double[] getIntersection(double[] v0,
                                       double[] v1,
                                       float edgeVal,
                                       HW2_zfergus2.SutherlandHodgmanPolygonClipping.ClippingEdge clippingEdge)
        Computes the intersection of the line given and the edge specified.
        Parameters:
        v0 - A double[] for the position of the line's starting point.
        v1 - A double[] for the position of the line's ending point.
        edgeVal - A float for the value of the edge to intersect with.
        clippingEdge - The ClippingEdge for the edge to intersect with.
        Returns:
        Returns a double[] for the point of intersection.
